content: During Q2, we surpassed $200 million of quarterly revenues for the first time with year-over-year revenue growth of 29% including 23% organic constant currency revenue growth even as we lapped last year's second quarter growth of 80%. For 2022, we now expect to generate revenues of $785 million to $795 million, representing year-over-year growth of 22% to 24%; adjusted EBITDA of $214 million to $220 million, representing year-over-year growth of 19.5% to 23% and adjusted net income of $115 million to $118 million, representing year-over-year growth of 25% to 28%.
